name: TomcatDeployment
description: Deploy application to a Tomcat server.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: TomcatUrl
inputs.label: Tomcat Server URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the Tomcat server URL, including the procotol, host and port details. Example- http://test.azure.cloudapp.net:8080

inputs.name: Username
inputs.label: Tomcat Manager Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the user name to connect to Tomcat Manager. Tomcat Manager should be running on the server.

inputs.name: Password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the password to connect to Tomcat Manager.
This field can accept a variable defined in Build/Release definitions as '$(passwordVariable)'.
You may mark variable type as 'secret' to secure it.

inputs.name: Warfile
inputs.label: WAR File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Absolute path of the WAR file present on the agent machine, or a UNC Share. Example- C:\Agent\Binaries\Demo.war Or $(warFilePath).

inputs.name: Context
inputs.label: Application Context
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the application context path. Example- /Production

inputs.name: ArtifactVersion
inputs.label: Artifact Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of the artifact which will be used for the Tomcat parallel deployment.

instanceNameFormat: Deploy application to a Tomcat server
